text:
AskBQ is BloombergQuint’s daily offering where market experts help investors make the right investment choice — be it in equities, commodities or the derivatives markets.On Tuesday’s episode, Sandeep Jain, chairman Tradeswift Broking Pvt. Ltd., and Rahul Randeria, technical analyst (equity) at IFCI FInancial Services gave their views on Eicher Motors, ACC, TCS, Puravankara and many more.Watch the full interaction here:











Here are the edited excerpts of the interview:
title: Should You Invest In ACC, TCS, ONGC, Puravankara? #AskBQ
